content: I am a postdoc in the School of Civil & Environmental Engineering at Georgia Tech. My research focuses on emerging mobility services and technology, and I am particularly interested in their implications to environmental sustainability and social equity. I have rich experience in teaching GIS and quantitiatve method courses, and recently I taught open-source GIS with R and data visualization with Tableau.
summary: I am a postdoc in the School of Civil & Environmental Engineering at Georgia Tech. My research focuses on emerging mobility services and technology, and I am particularly interested in their implications to environmental sustainability and social equity.
title: Yongsung Lee
